name: Connect the Dots (Heinous Games)
description:
This is our submission for the Extra Credits Game Jam: "Connect"

We built a Connect the Dots game where the dots aren't numbered, so you must explore to determine where the paths connect! The paths will light up as you make the connections, so every dot has another dot it connects to, but can you find them all?

Use the ARROW KEYS to move around the map. When all of the paths are found, you beat the level!
